text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Until the live, just a little longer, huh...
Did I make the right choice for me, for SHHis...
I came to say I can't do it...

...Just like this...
Just keep going like this... and fail...

...Your dance, Mikoto-san...
I... might... ruin it...

...Standing on stage and showing something good
about yourself... That's all I think it is.

If you can't do it,
there's no helping it.

...............
I'm sorry... I'm sorry for the interruption...!
Ah...
...S-Sorry...

...Wait.
Can you give me a minute?
Producer──────

I had a feeling the two of you might be here.
...Can we talk?

....
I'm already...

...
Please come in.
Ah, excuse me.

I think you just need to perform what you're capable of...
...Stop dancing, Nichika.

The best performance that SHHis can show...
We'll present that... together.
